item.title: Opinion Poll by Promocija Plus for HRT, 8–9 January 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Radnička fronta (GUE/NGL): 0.7–2.2%
  • Domovinski pokret (ECR): 2.0–4.4%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (*): 0.8–2.5%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (ECR): 6.6–10.4%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 24.8–30.9%
  • Centar (RE): 0.9–2.7%
  • Nezavisna Platforma Sjever (*): 0.7–2.2%
  • Fokus na bitno (RE): 0.6–2.0%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (RE): 0.7–2.2%
  • Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 28.9–35.2%
  • Hrvatski suverenisti (ECR): 0.3–1.6%
  • Hrvatska stranka umirovljenika (*): 0.4–1.7%
  • Pravo i Pravda (NI): 0.4–1.7%
  • Možemo! (Greens/EFA): 9.0–13.2%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (RE): 0.8–2.5%
